name: VinuChain
description: VinuChain is a groundbreaking blockchain project that encompasses the best of both worlds - innovation and scalability. As a DAG-based EVM chain, VinuChain boasts one second finality and near-infinite scalability at a fraction of the cost of traditional blockchains. VinuChain also offers the unique advantage of ‘Determinably Feeless’ transactions. The experienced team are seasoned blockchain enthusiasts and even co-authored Ethereum’s EIP-5375.
